name: Ramz Silver
description: A luxurious, woody fragrance for men with notes of amber, leather, and musk.

name: Zarar Women
description: Elegant and floral, blending jasmine, rose, and musk for a captivating scent.

name: Art of Universe
description: A unisex perfume that embodies cosmic beauty with oud, amber, and vanilla.

name: Barakkat Rouge 540
description: A warm amber floral scent with saffron and cedarwood.

name: Club de Nuit Intense

name: Enchantment Blue Intense
description: Fresh oceanic fragrance with subtle musk undertones.

name: Qaed Al Fursan
description: Rich, bold, and woody scent for confident individuals.

name: Honor & Glory
description: A heroic mix of spice, oud, and amber that lasts all day.
